item.title: RE: [BISD-4101] [Customer] Refresh NEW NAMM SNF Report

item.description:
This issue requires your attention. Michael Kleban, Hengqiao Zhao



Author: Michael Kleban (BISD-4101)

item.title: RE: [BISD-4101] [Customer] Refresh NEW NAMM SNF Report
item.author: Mary Hargadine
item.description:
I need to set up some time to go through this report with you as we are missing data, i.e. need answer rate by facility by month (not necessarily by week). In the meantime, I need to get the original report we were using for SNF updated so I can send to them. I'll sent out a calendar invite. Thanks.

Warm Regards,

Mary A. Hargadine
EVP, Client Development
AMC Health

39 Broadway, Suite 540
New York, NY 10006
Contact info: 314.378.3217
mhargadine@amchealth.com
visit our website: www.amchealth.com

item.title: RE: [BISD-4101] [Customer] Refresh NEW NAMM SNF Report
item.author: Michael Kleban
item.description:
We have marked this ticket as "Done", which means that we have completed the work. Please review and let us know if we may close this out. The ticket will be resolved completely if the ticket is not updated within two weeks.



Author: Michael Kleban (BISD-4101)
